tool_description: The GPT-Generated Kenyan News API generates original news articles tailored specifically for the Kenyan context.
title: GPT-Generated Kenyan News API

api_list.name: getArticleById
api_list.description: Get specific articles by their IDs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gpt-generated-kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gpt-generated-kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getArticleByCategory
api_list.description: Get articles of different categories  Politics, Entertainment, Exclusive, News, Lifestyle
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gpt-generated-kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{category}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getAllArticles
api_list.description: Retrieves all articles for all categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gpt-generated-kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/articles"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gpt-generated-kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
